mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BALANCE ( COMPANY_MGMTNO, USER_MGMTSEQ, SALE_STR_DATE, SALE_END_DATE, SALE_COMMISSION, CP_COMMISSION, OWNER_PROFIT, TOTAL_SALE_COUNT, TOTAL_SALE_PRICE, MOD_DT, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{company_mgmtno}, #{user_mgmtseq}, #{sale_str_date}, #{sale_end_date}, #{sale_commission}, #{cp_commission}, #{owner_profit}, #{total_sale_count}, #{total_sale_price}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT BAL.*, COM.COMPANY_NAME FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.REG_DT BETWEEN TIMESTAMP(CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m'), '01')) AND TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY((NOW())), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59'))
ORDER BY BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY BAL.OWNER_PROFIT DESC
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC

SELECT BAL.*, COM.COMPANY_NAME FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.REG_DT BETWEEN #{sale_str_date} AND #{sale_end_date}
ORDER BY BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY BAL.OWNER_PROFIT DESC
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC

SELECT BAL.*, COM.COMPANY_NAME FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
ORDER BY BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY BAL.OWNER_PROFIT DESC
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC
